price: 61. Als jij hen zou vragen: “Wie heeft de hemelen en de aarde geschapen en de zon en de maan onderworpen?” Zullen zij zeker antwoorden: “Allah.” Hoe kunnen zij dan afwijken?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
